# Analysis

```{r read_data}

filename <- "../output/results.csv"

results <- read_csv(filename)



results %>% 
  ggplot() +
  aes(x = step, y = seen, group = runid) + geom_line()

results %>% group_by(runid) %>% arrange(-step) %>% top_n(1, step) %>% 
  ggplot() +
  aes(x = cognitive_value, y = seen, color = affective_value) + geom_point()

```
